WorkItem.Description:
For whatever reason, when I try to map a datareader/datarecord to an object, even if I specify a constructor to use (ConstructUsing), the specified constructor method is never called whether it's a specified constructor or some other factory method.
 
I have attached tests that should be self explanatory.
 
Am I just using the method wrong?
WorkItem.Summary: ConstructUsing does not properly construct object when using a DataReader
